name: Delty
long_description:
As software systems grow more complex and teams scale, key engineering work happens outside of code: product specs, docs, and architecture decisions and norms. Thatâ€™s where a staff software engineer shines.

Delty is an AI staff engineer.

Like a seasoned engineer embedded in your team, Delty understands your architecture, code evolution, and constraints. It designs new software systems and grounds your coding agents with real engineering context to help you deliver reliable, scalable systems, fast.
one_liner: AI staff engineer: software architect that leads coding agents
